response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the sink. The next step is to put the chopping board on the sink.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the breakfast table where the chopping board is located.
(2) Grasp the chopping board.
(3) Move the robot to the sink.
(4) Put the chopping board on the sink.
(5) Put the chopping board in the sink.
response.code:
